issue.title: [C++] Unify decimal and fixed-size binary implementations in kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14174](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14174). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-14027 incidentally adds helpers to manipulate decimal scalars as just bytes - we should take advantage of this to consolidate kernel implementations for functions like case_when, if_else, and coalesce that had different implementations since decimal scalars previously had a different layout.
